title: My Quest to become toxic!
body:
Playing since LoL early days, I'm over being nice and striving to become a better player.

We seem to be now in the times where an old account just gets nailed deeper into the ground, no benifits for having long term accounts (prob not profitable for riot). 

Seem's like a time where you create 50 accounts just in hope to get one into high ranking tier, play it once a week to prevent decay use the other 49 to troll and prevent people climbing.

Become toxic and troll, get banned, reform and come back! welcome to 2018!

replies.body: You're bronze with a 42% winrate and diamond season 5 while the rest was silver guess someone got boosted? Maybe you should focus on actually adapting to the meta and learning a specific role inside and out. I was only bronze for season 3 and only got gold this season, sure im not high elo but at least im steadily improving.
Cool story bruh needs more dragons
